abstract: White Collar Watch examines the implications of a late amendment to the financial regulatory bill that would increase the liability for law firms, accounting firms and investment banks in securities fraud cases.
snippet: White Collar Watch examines the implications of a late amendment to the financial regulatory bill that would increase the liability for law firms, accounting firms and investment banks in securities fraud cases.
lead_paragraph: 4:23 p.m. | Updated: An amendment to the financial bill to increase liability in securities fraud cases has been replaced by a provision for the Securities and Exchange Commission to study the issue, a spokesman for the House Financial Services Committee said Monday.

headline.main: A Proposal to Increase Securities Fraud Liability
